Method Detail

createBranchForDevAndQa

public boolean createBranchForDevAndQa(java.lang.String basename)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Deprecated. 

Creates 2 branches with different prefixes and the given basename.

The branch name prefixes used are cd-dev- and cd-qa-

Parameters:
basename - The common basename to use for the branches.
Returns:
true if both of the branches where created and pushed successfully onto the remote repository.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

createBranchForGene

public boolean createBranchForGene(java.lang.String basename)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Deprecated. 

Creates a branch with the prefix of cd-gene- and the given basename.

Parameters:
basename - The basename to user for the branch.
Returns:
true if the branch was created and pushed successfully onto the remote repository.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

Returns:
The wrapped GitService instance.

closeAndRemoveLocal

public void closeAndRemoveLocal()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Closes the wrapped GitService instance and removes the directory and all of the contents of the locally cloned repository.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
